reviewText: Very good movie with Tony Curtis on vhs tape. A shame it hasn't been released on dvd nowhere! Must have copyright issues.

I thought this would be funny and I was right. Tony scamps around europe and gets some pretty nice hiney.
It is worth every penny to see Silva Kochina semi nude. She is so beautiful. Even Rod Stuarts ex-wife gets topless, and that is, again, worth every penny. Holy cow, GREAT assets.
Get it for fun, and late night action.
On of. tony Curtis best. Have watched it many times and still catch. Funny. Lines. A. Collectors VHS. Needs dvd
This is a fun sexy comedy with lots of beautiful topless girls, no oscar winning performances, but sheer fun.
